game.name: The Dead End
game.shortDescription: An ancient witch, a living dungeon, an undead curse, and a lost Holy Maiden. Greater men than you have fallen in the cursed dungeon of Witchhome. What awaits you in the depths? Fame? Or infamy?
game.shortDescriptionEn: An ancient witch, a living dungeon, an undead curse, and a lost Holy Maiden. Greater men than you have fallen in the cursed dungeon of Witchhome. What awaits you in the depths? Fame? Or infamy?

reviewHighlights.text: fun but dark. really wish it didnt have the "young" man/woman stuff but you can avoid it.
